LightningComponentBundle.description: SF PEG Component enabling to display a list of CMS Contents based on a stringified list of ContentKeys

property.name: contentKeys
property.label: Content Keys
property.description: List of ContentKeys to display (as a JSON stringified string array)

property.name: displayCmp
property.label: Display Component
property.description: Developer Name of the Component used to display children (as c/cmpName)

property.name: displayConfig
property.label: Display Configuration
property.description: Properties to provide as input to the component for each content (as a stringified JSON object)

property.name: wrappingCss
property.label: Wrapping Classes
property.description: CSS classes to apply to the main wrapping div

property.name: contentCss
property.label: Content Classes
property.description: CSS classes to apply to the div wrapping each individual content component
